code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import filter from"./filter/slice";import cart from"./cart/slice";import pizza from"./pizza/slice";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";export var store=configureStore({reducer:{filter:filter,cart:cart,pizza:pizza}});export var useAppDispatch=function useAppDispatch(){return useDispatch();};
